attributes.action: Stop the encouragement of anti social behaviour by Faceparty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Faceparty encourages anti social behaviour and sends the message to young people that being disrespectful and rude is cool.
Also, you can't get onto the faceparty site without sawing a dog in 2 while hearing the dog cry. Encouraging animal cruelty towards dogs too now.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
